action.action-desc: Ms. Hirono (for herself and Mr. Van Hollen) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

form.official-title: To institute a reduction in force moratorium at the National Aeronautics and Space Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Saving NASA’s Workforce Act.

section.header: Reduction in force moratorium at National Aeronautics and Space Administration

subsection.text: Until the date that full-year appropriations for the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for fiscal year 2026 have been enacted into law, the National Aeronautics and Space Administration may not conduct any reduction in force pursuant to sections 3501 through 3504 and 3595 of title 5, United States Code.
For the purposes of carrying out subsection (a), such subsection shall be in addition to any other authority with respect to adverse personnel actions, including chapter 75 of such title 5.
